1.title: Fall and Pico
1.plot: Ronny Bhaiya has been entrusted with the responsibility of getting Avantika's Saree's Fall and Pico done as she needs to wear it for a work event. But his lie of being the Vidhayak's nephew lands him into a situation where he needs to get an impounded bike back from a super cop- Singham for a 16 year old kid and also show his power by slapping him.

2.title: Tere Naam dekhi hai?
2.plot: Avantika needs Ronny's help to get confirmed train tickets. Ronny has access to the "Vidhayak Quota" and can get it done easily. Unfortunately this promise turns out to be more challenging than was estimated. Meanwhile the flour at home is over- and father and son are having a power tussle over who must go and get the chakki ka aata for the rotis.

3.title: Yun Banta Hai Paisa
3.plot: Anwar is very confident in Ronny's reach and gets a young boy Gaurav who needs admission in a college. Ronny reaches out to another fixer and gets himself and his friends into a financial mess. Meanwhile his father seems to be in some trouble at work and Ronny may solve his father's and his problem by putting them in a deeper mess.

4.title: Bhaiya Ka Hoarding
4.plot: Ronny's birthday celebrations begin with a surprise cake arriving at his doorstep. The love letter attached reassures him of Avantika's affections towards him and makes his parents extremely suspicious of his activities. Meanwhile Avantika plans a surprise for Ronny with Kranti and Anwar, wanting to make Ronny's biggest dream come true.

5.title: Chacha Ka Driver
5.plot: Ronny takes up a job to put up posters on the sidewalks for ChachaJi. Avantika needs his help as ChachaJi's driver and trusted sidekick is harassing her friend. They are depending on Ronny to fix this situation considering he is related to Chachaji's. He must somehow protect the girls while keeping the illusion of his relation to Chachaji alive.

6.title: Future Ki Photo
6.plot: Ronny decides to lead a movement against the VC of a college on the request of some students. The VC has preponed their exam which endangers their careers. Simultaneously Ronny finds that in order to be eligible to marry Avantika he must find a job. When the situation at college goes from bad to worse, his personal life is left in a deeped shamble.

7.title: Sadharan Beta
7.plot: Ronny's father learns about his attempt at self-immolation and asks him to leave Indore. Avantika runs away from home with Lucky but her parents think she and Ronny have eloped. They go to the Vidhayak to complain about his nephew, only to learn the truth that he is not Ronny's ChachaJi. A kidnapping case is filed against Ronny, and with Ronny missing his father is taken into custody.

8.title: Aur Phir...
8.plot: In order to clear his name and get his father released Ronny needs to take Avantika to the police, but she has asked for his help in getting married to Lucky. A broken-hearted Ronny agrees. The Vidhayak and his men manage to catch Anwar. Ever-loyal Anwar confesses that while Ronny may have lied about his relation to Chachaji, he is in fact a great leader. Chachaji confronts Ronny about his lies.

imdb.plot outline: Ronny's whole life is based on a lie. To the world he is the nephew of the local MLA and a youth leader who solves people's problems. But in reality, Ronny is a jobless 25 year old with no relation to the MLA who shares his surname. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this lie. He has two trusted friends, Anwar and Kranti who don't know the truth either and consider Ronny their leader. Ronny is in love with Avantika but she is too busy obsessing about her ex to notice his feelings. His family is concerned about his future and is dismayed at his lack of interest in studying or getting a job. His sister who suspects Ronny is lying about something is constantly trying to get him into trouble with their parents. Ronny's trusted mentor Santosh Bhaiya is the only one who knows the truth and tries to help Ronny.

Ronny's whole life is based on a lie. To the world he is the nephew of the MLA and a wanna be youth leader who solves people's problems. But in reality, Ronny is a jobless 26 year old with no relation to the MLA who shares his surname. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this lie.
